example.text: It’s only going to get worse after Title 42 ends at midnight. Joe Biden and Mayorkas are completely absent. [[url]]
Republicans just passed the strongest border security bill in modern history. Another win for the American people.
Joe Biden vacations at his beach house while our Border Patrol agents work overtime to stop the chaos he caused at the southern border.
Republicans just passed the strongest border security bill in modern history. Another win for the American people.

Mr Speaker, I was absent from the Floor during today's roll call vote (No. 251) on HR, 3099, the Special Envoy for the Abraham Accords Act. I strongly support this legislation, which builds upon President Trump's important work toward greater stability between the State of Israel and other countries in the region, and would have voted in support of it had I been present,

House Republicans: -Passed a bill to defund Joe Biden’s 87,000 new IRS agents. -Passed a bill to address the debt ceiling, reign in out-of-control spending, and tame inflation. -Passed the strongest border security bill modern history.
